1.16.1.1.16.1-1.5.30: Config now appears in server config folder rather than the config folder. Fixed Curios Compatibility.
1.16.1.1.16.1-1.5.31: Added license field to mod.toml fixing crash with latest forge version

1.16.2.1.16.2-1.5.32:
Fixed pedestal GUI title appearing not correctly.
Removed creeper tnt as it was not balanced.
Revert the bug which would cause all plant items to despawn in a minute. 
Disabled fortune and blazing being allowed together.

1.16.4.1.16.4-1.5.36: Added Beehive tooltips and easier recipe for repeater and trapped chest.
1.16.4.1.16.4-1.5.39: Added configuration option for dynamite cool down and explosion power

1.17.1.1.17.1-1.5.41:
Rewrite homing enchantment.
 Fix armor swapping not working.
1.17.1.1.17.1-1.5.42:
Blazing now can be applied with fortune.
 Enchantment which are disabled won't appear in loot chests or enchantment table.
 Silk Spawner now works again.
 You can now place sign on other signs when shift right clicking.
 Removed better stairs and stone tools.
1.17.1.1.17.1-1.5.43:
Started using DeferredRegistry instead of RegistryEvents.
Added back JEI support.
Removed unused translation texts.
 Added an config to make enchantments appear only in loot.
1.17.1.1.17.1-1.5.44: Rework advancements for the mod to not appear in the menu but unlock the recipes.
1.17.1.1.17.1-1.5.45: When blazing and fortune are both present, fortune effect happens and then blazing effect.
